reasons: Directly about EUR/USD pair forecast from a major bank.

reasons: Directly about EUR/USD pair price action.

items.label: most_relevant
reasons: Directly about a key Eurozone inflation outlook from a major bank.
Eurozone inflation is a primary driver for ECB policy and the EUR, a core component of EUR/USD.

items.label: relevant
reasons: EUR-only news (Euro weakness).
The driver (global trade concerns, US tariff measures) is also a major USD driver, making it indirectly relevant to EUR/USD.

items.label: relevant
reasons: EUR-cross pair analysis (EUR/JPY).
Provides insight into Euro dynamics via a major cross, relevant for understanding broader EUR sentiment.

items.label: relevant
reasons: EUR-cross pair analysis (EUR/JPY).

items.label: unrelated

items.label: unrelated

No connection to USD or broader EUR/USD drivers.
